# 新启动 Daily (XinQiDong Daily)

> AI-powered daily tech digest. Monitors 92 top tech blogs, AI selects the most valuable articles and generates Chinese summaries.

## Endpoints

- Latest digest (JSON): /api/digest/latest
- Latest digest (Markdown): /llms-full.txt
- Specific date: /api/digest/YYYY-MM-DD
- Feed list: /api/feeds
- Archive: /api/archive
- OpenClaw Skill: /SKILL.md

## Usage

To get today's tech digest, fetch `/api/digest/latest` for structured JSON or `/llms-full.txt` for plain markdown.

The `summary_md` field in the JSON response contains the full Chinese digest in Markdown format.
